title: Fare placements?

replies.body: seems pretty fair considering people complaining on here have been placed a whole division lower.

> [{quoted}](name=Santi,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=zsfIoWIN,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-20T15:02:51.383+0000)
>
> I finished gold 2 before the season started. Now even though i won 10 out of 10 of my placement ranked games i ended up gold 3
> Do u guys find that fare?. whats the point of wining this placement rankeds if u still gonna be placed lower. 
> im feeling like him ---> {{champion:32}}

no i feel that the system that applied you to gold 3 is flaud you should have started at bronze 5 and worked your way up like every other sport in the world !

well i started from bronze 2 and have been making my way up. just think that if u do well in the placements at least u should go up a divisions , as it happens when u are doing really well and get promoted 2 divisions up after ur promo.
That's not that bad at all. Ended S2 and placed B4. Its awful. I've read players who were in gold like you being placed B5. It's real messed up at the moment.

ive only done 2 games so far both being losses (yay :/ ) i finished in B1 last season so im just dreading seeing my ranking pretty much expecting B5 at this point in which i will leave ranked because well there is no point in trying to climb out when i main suport.
i finished gold4, won 8 out of 10 games and got put in silver4, please mate id rather be in your position.
i ended my smurf in gold 2, won 6 out of 10 and got gold 1 lol.
